title: Akshata Murthy, wife of UK finance minister Rishi Sunak, is richer than the Queen of Britain - Times Now
content: Akshata Murthy, wife of UK finance minister Rishi Sunak, is richer than the Queen of Britain  Times Now
description: Akshata Murthy possesses shares worth over £430 million in Infosys. In comparison, the Queen’s personal wealth is around £350 million.
